FuncDef: The display multicast-domain control-message counters command displays the statistics about the sent and received MDT switch messages in a specified VPN instance or all VPN instances.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the statistics about the sent and received MDT switch messages in all VPN instances.
-

Displays the statistics about the sent and received MDT switch messages in a specified VPN instance. vpn-instance-name specifies the VPN instance name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display multicast-domain vpn-instance red control-message counters
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can run the display multicast-domain vpn-instance control-message counters command to view the statistics about the sent and received MDT switch messages in a specified VPN instance.
